backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing player state and progression flags with methods to update stress, scene, items, save spots, and barricaded doors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing fixes for black 3D scene issue and listing relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping numerous frontend paths to short summaries of their roles, mainly covering rendering, lighting, UI, controls, AI, and gameplay logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up root element and loading the main frontend script with fullscreen layout.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps GameView in a dark-mode ThemeProvider with a full-size container.
frontend/src/game/Audio/audioSettingsSto: Zustand store persisting global audio volume and mute settings with setters.
Hook generating tension audio using Web Audio API and adjusting volume based on enemy proximity and mouth state.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/DialogueConte: Dialogue provider managing a timed queue of dialogue lines with show/hide controls.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/scriptedLines: Exports predefined enemy dialogue lines used by AI and events.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/gree: AI hook determining idle, patrol, and chase states based on player distance and triggering threat dialogue.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/Gree: Green Hood enemy entity handling model rendering, movement, orientation, and AI-driven target following.
3D model of Green Hood with hood, glowing eyes, and mouth/teeth shown when revealed.
frontend/src/game/Gameplay/hoodFallMecha: Implements a timed event where looking at a target triggers stress penalty, including vector dot-product checks and a reaction window.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game container rendering the 3D scene with tuned tone mapping, FacilityWorld, player controller, scene logic, and HUD.
frontend/src/game/Input/useInputMode.ts: Chooses between touch and keyboard/mouse inputs, syncing movement, look, and interact states.
frontend/src/game/Input/useKeyboardMouse: Tracks WASD movement, mouse look deltas, and interact key presses using event listeners and periodic updates.
frontend/src/game/Input/useTouchLook.ts: Computes look deltas from touch movement on the screen’s right side, accumulating movement and emitting updates periodically.
frontend/src/game/Player/PlayerControlle: Updates camera movement and orientation based on input and synchronizes player position with state each frame.
frontend/src/game/Scenes/SceneDirector.t: Triggers scripted dialogue events when entering scenes, such as an intro line after a delay.
frontend/src/game/State/usePlayerState.t: Maintains player state synced with the backend actor and exposes update functions for stress, scene, items, and position.
frontend/src/game/World/FacilityWorld.ts: Builds a 3D facility environment with lights, flicker effects, walls, and objects, including enemy placement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps player-state queries and stress mutation calls using react-query with backend actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, fonts, and custom color tokens for a horror-themed UI along with base layout and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
Touch-friendly interact button that triggers a brief interact input state using a themed image.
Displays a temporary interaction prompt UI element when a prompt string is set.
Implements a touch-based virtual joystick that tracks movement and sends normalized directional input.
frontend/src/ui/Dialogue/DialogueBox.tsx: Renders a jagged-frame bottom dialogue box showing the current line when dialogue is active.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/HudShell.tsx: Composes the full HUD including stress indicator, dialogue, overlays, mobile controls, and settings panel.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/StressIndicator.tsx: Shows the player's stress percentage with color-coded feedback using a progress bar.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/FadeToBlack.tsx: Draws a timed fade‑to‑black overlay that animates opacity when activated.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/HoodVignetteOve: Applies a dark vignette overlay resembling a hood effect across the screen.
frontend/src/ui/Settings/SettingsPanel.t: Settings dialog allowing volume adjustment and audio muting using shared audio state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the game’s goals, features, issues, and architectural notes.
